questions.answer: Synchronize operations and control the timing of the processor

questions.question: Which storage device provides the fastest access to data?

options: Serve as the main circuit board connecting components

options: Perform complex graphics and parallel processing tasks
questions.answer: Perform complex graphics and parallel processing tasks

questions.question: Which component is responsible for converting digital data into analog signals for communication over telephone lines?

options: Handle input and output operations between the CPU and external devices
questions.answer: Handle input and output operations between the CPU and external devices

questions.question: Which term refers to the number of bits processed by a computer's CPU in a single instruction?

options: Provide basic input/output functions and bootstrap the computer
questions.answer: Provide basic input/output functions and bootstrap the computer

options: Dissipate heat generated by the CPU to prevent overheating
questions.answer: Dissipate heat generated by the CPU to prevent overheating
